original_title: ABC News Presents: Pope John Paul II: His Life and Legacy
overview: The intriguing life of Pope John Paul II is profiled in this comprehensive documentary that paints a thorough portrait of the man so many Catholics look to for guidance, healing and strength. His courage and resolve as a leader have put him at the forefront of a religion often caught up in controversy. Narrated by Bill Blakemore, this release also includes the Pope's unique 2003 appearance on television's "Good Morning America."
title: ABC News Presents: Pope John Paul II: His Life and Legacy
